title: Prepare to become a certified Salesforce app developer — just $15 thru Jan. 14
content:
Macworld

Salesforce is an industry leading CRM platform that tracks client information and interactions. And professionals who know how to navigate it are in demand right now. Want to start training for a career with room to grow? Then get started with the 2023 Salesforce Platform App Builder Certification Training Bundle, offered at a discounted price through January 14.

This training package is ideal for anyone who wants to become an expert Salesforce app developer. Students get an overview of the CRM platform, learn how to create and deploy custom apps, and discover how AI tools like ChatGPT are used to assist in development. By the end, they’ll have the requisite knowledge to pass Salesforce certification exams, which is a nice value add.

The three included courses are facilitated by Packt Publishing, a well-known supplier for web based learning with an average rating of 5/5 stars. There are no class schedules, assignments to hand in, or due dates to remember. Instead, you direct your own learning and go at your own pace. It’s a very relaxed way to learn. And since it’s on sale right now, it’s way more economical too.

Get the 2024 Salesforce Platform App Builder Certification Training Bundle for just $14.99 (reg. $170) when you purchase before 11:59pm on January 14.

The 2024 Salesforce Platform App Builder Certification Training Bundle – $14.99
